_doc: Dzine B-roll generation contract. Reference-only: never recreate products from text.
golden_rule: Never prompt Dzine to 'create the product'. Only: 'animate this exact reference image'.
prompt_template: Studio product shot animation of the exact same product from the reference image. Maintain identical shape, color, materials, buttons, ports, labels. Subtle cinematic lighting. Slow camera move (push-in 2-4%). No text overlays. No new features. No re-design.
negative_template: incorrect shape, different color, added buttons, added screen, brand text, watermark, new labels, unrealistic redesign, cartoon, CGI look, distorted perspective

shot_list._doc: Per product, generate 2 clips max. If either fails QC, use Ken Burns.

fallback.trigger: any clip fails product fidelity QC

product_fidelity_qc._doc: Deterministic visual QC for product B-roll. Compare output to Amazon source image.
product_fidelity_qc.pass_criteria: Shape, color, materials, key features all match source image

script_truth_boundary._doc: Rules for script generation to avoid hallucinated product claims.
allowed: What is visible in Amazon images (downloaded locally)
What is in Amazon bullet points/specs (if stored in products.json)
forbidden: Performance claims not on Amazon page
Specs not evidenced by stored data
